resource.chars:
Nov. 6 08 
Dear Sir Archibald.
I forgot to let you 
know, as I had intended, that 
at our Council meeting on 
Monday the Antarctic affair 
was not discussed - indeed 
barely mentioned  - this being 
the indirect result of our 
interview. I do not think 
that Sir Clement Markham 
knew that you had expressed 
any wish to Scott as to not
